- - 1 SurveyPage - Page One
-
- - 2 SurveyDecorative instructions -
We very much hope you enjoyed your recent experience at The Arch London.
It is important to us that you love being here as much as we do and for that reason we ask if you could spare a couple of minutes to complete this short hotel guest experience survey.
Privacy is important to us and your comments will be kept confidential and will only be used in relation to this short survey.
Thank you very much for taking the time to complete this survey.
Michael Voigt
General Manager
www.thearchlondon.com
-
instructions

- 1 SurveyDecorative instructions -
Thank you for your time & assistance in completing this survey, your feedback is invaluable as we continually strive to improve our services.
If we can be of any assistance in the future, please do not hesitate to contact us directly.
Michael Voigt
General Manager
www.thearchlondon.com
